attributes.action: Allow the selling of fairtrade food and drink allowed in schools (Including chocolate)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Me and a lot of people would think this is a good idea for lots of students. It would be a great way to spread the word of fairtrade items and therefore help improve lives in the 3rd world. As well as this, all of our profits would go to amnesty international and therefore has a duel purpose. I think a lot of people will back this up across the country.
